metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19406 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
kvm_pv_send_ipi in arch/x86/kvm/lapic.c in the Linux kernel through 4.19.2 allows local users to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and BUG) via crafted system calls that reach a situation where the apic map is uninitialized.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19406` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
